title: The Week of Bob King: A Superhero at 67
summary: Bob King, a 67-year-old retired teacher, discovers his late-blooming superpowers during a week of mentoring and social service, ultimately saving his community from unexpected danger.
summaryGerman: Bob King, ein 67-jähriger pensionierter Lehrer, entdeckt während einer Woche des Mentorings und sozialen Engagements seine spät aufblühenden Superkräfte und rettet letztendlich seine Gemeinde vor unerwarteter Gefahr.
summaryDutch: Bob King, een 67-jarige gepensioneerde leraar, ontdekt zijn laat ontluikende superkrachten tijdens een week van mentorschap en maatschappelijke dienstverlening, en redt uiteindelijk zijn gemeenschap van onverwacht gevaar.
summaryFrench: Bob King, un enseignant retraité de 67 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs tardifs pendant une semaine de mentorat et de service social, sauvant finalement sa communauté d'un danger inattendu.

story.text: Bob King starts his week with a peaceful morning of gardening, unknowingly absorbing a mysterious energy from a meteorite fragment in his soil.
Feeling unusually energetic, Bob volunteers at a local school, where he effortlessly lifts a car off a trapped cat, astonishing everyone.
Bob mentors young teachers and uses his new powers to repair broken school equipment instantly, making him feel triumphant and useful.
Rumors of Bob's deeds spread, making his Thursday eerie as mysterious figures observe him from a distance.
Local criminals attempt to exploit Bob's powers. He outsmarts them with his wisdom and new abilities, leading to a dramatic showdown.
The community rallies around Bob, celebrating his heroism with a romantic evening event, where he shares a dance with his long-time crush.
Reflecting on his week, Bob feels happy and decides to use his superpowers to continue teaching, mentoring, and protecting his community.

moral: No matter the age, you're never too old to make a difference.
ending: And so, Bob King lived each new day as a mentor, a hero, and a beloved figure in his community.
